name: The Absurd
description:
The Absurd is a game demo / school project that is inspired by works such as Celeste, Super Metroid, and Existentialism is a Humanism by Sartre.

You can play this game with a keyboard or with an xbox controller (idk if other controllers work I haven't tried). 

KEYBOARD: You can use WASD, UIO, and R to interact with the level.

CONTROLLER: You can use Analog Stick/D-Pad, ABX, and RB to interact.

Other than that and a few hints if you're  really stuck, that's about all I can tell you ;)

Hint 1: If you haven't figured it out from the first room, try using the R button to do some stuff. Hint 2: If you're still stuck, try reading the first hint again. Hint 3: Some video games aren't for everyone. Try reading a good book, I suggest My Immortal, it's a Harry Potter fanfic where everyone is goth (it's really good you can read the whole thing at https://myimmortalrehost.webs.com/

If you want to support the full game's development, head over to https://discord.gg/cTy3XHqW8g and tell me "wow @Jsaur#8259 you did such a good job on your english project muah~"
